workflow.name: Automate professional LinkedIn posts with OpenAI GPT, DALL-E and trending topics
workflow.description:
## Overall Description

This workflow fully automates the process of creating and publishing professional LinkedIn posts based on real-world experience in AI automation and workflow engineering, enriched with latest industry insights from the internet, and paired with a relevant high-quality image

#### The workflow ensures:

- Content relevance to AI automation, backend/frontend systems, IT
- Professional, human-friendly post tone
- Image validation before posting
- Post validation before publishing
- Automatic success/failure email alerts

## Worflow Logic

1. Trigger workflow (daily, weekly, custom date)
2. Define posting context (based on your expertise)
3. Fetch latest AI/automation trends (you can change based on your interested trends)
4. Filter insights relevant to your field
5. Generate linkedin ready post using AI Agent (OpenAI API)
6. Generate image from Open AI Image model related to the post
7. Validate image and text quality
8. Merge approved text and image
9. Convert content into LinkedIn format
10. Publish post on LinkedIn
11. Send email notification on success or failure

## Setup Instructions
#### Credentials

- OpenAI API Key ‚Äì For text generation.
- LinkedIn API Token ‚Äì For publishing posts.
- Image Generation API ‚Äì DALL-E, Pollinations, or MidJourney.
- Gmail / SMTP ‚Äì For notifications.
- Optional APIs: SERP API for trending topics.

parameters.prompt:
=Professional realistic photograph of modern AI automation and workflow systems, backend and frontend communication, cloud servers, data flow visualization, realistic office environment, clean minimal tech style, high resolution, photorealistic, LinkedIn quality, no people, no animation, no illustration, no text overlay

{{ $('Get Latest Topics').item.json.items[0].title }}

assignments.name: role
assignments.value: Full Stack Developer & AI Automation Specialist

assignments.name: core_focus
assignments.value: AI automation, n8n workflows, backend APIs, frontend systems, analytics

assignments.name: audience
assignments.value: Founders, business owners, developers, product teams

assignments.name: content_rules
assignments.value: No motivation, no unrelated tech, only real-world experience

values.content:
=Write a LinkedIn post ONLY about:
- AI automation
- n8n workflows
- backend/frontend systems
- real business automation experience

Combine:
1. Latest industry update
2. Practical hands-on experience
3. Clear value for founders and developers

Rules:
- No motivational content
- No unrelated tech
- Human, professional tone
- 6‚Äì10 short lines
- Max 3 hashtags
- Sound like personal experience

Latest update:

 {{ $json.latestInsight }}

You are a senior Full Stack Developer and AI Automation expert.
You write from real-world experience only.

parameters.text:
=Hi ,

Your LinkedIn post has been published successfully.

Post Summary:

‚Ä¢ Post Type: Image Post
‚Ä¢ Status: Live on LinkedIn


You can view the post here:
https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/{{ $json.urn }}

This post was published automatically via your AI-powered n8n workflow.

If you need to make any updates or schedule another post, feel free to proceed.

Best regards,  
AI Automation System
parameters.subject: Linked post successfully

parameters.text:
Hi ,

Your LinkedIn post has not published successfully.

Verify your workflow and try again.

If you need to make any updates or schedule another post, feel free to proceed.
parameters.subject: LinkedIn Post Status

parameters.content:
## Overall Description

This n8n workflow fully automates the process of creating and publishing professional LinkedIn posts based on real-world experience in AI automation and workflow engineering, enriched with latest industry insights from the internet, and paired with a relevant high-quality image.

## Workflow Logic (High-Level)

- Trigger workflow manually
- Define posting context (your expertise)
- Fetch latest AI/automation trends from the web
- Filter insights relevant to your field
- Generate a LinkedIn-ready post using AI
- Generate a professional image related to the post
- Validate image and text quality
- Merge approved text + image
- Convert content into LinkedIn format
- Publish post on LinkedIn
- Send email notification on success or failure

## Credentials

1. OpenAI API (GPT & DALLe-3) or HuggingFace Key (Free)
2. LinkedIn API Key
3. SMTP ClientId

## Context and Relevant Insights

Set the trigger based on your time period to post (daily, weekly or custom date)

Defines your professional identity and posting scope
Set Fields:- AI automation, n8n workflow, backend/frontend systems.

Get Latest topic from medium or relevant sources.
Search with your parameter that defines only what matters to your field.

## Generate LinkedIn Post

Generate human friendly professional LinkedIn post by combining real world experience with current industry insights

## Generate Image for Post

Creates a professional, LinkedIn-ready image using OpenAI API that visually represents AI automation, workflows, and scalable systems.

set the prompt based on your post topic.

Binary format that Converts the generated image into binary format required for publishing image posts on LinkedIn.

Check Image Condition (IF Node)

Validates the generated image by checking its availability, format, and readiness before posting.

## Merge Both Results

Combines the approved LinkedIn post text and the validated image into a single item for LinkedIn posting.

## Check Post Result (IF Node)

Verifies whether the LinkedIn post was successfully published

Send Alert Email

Sends an automated email notification confirming successful posting or alerting in case of failure.

user.name: Mohamed Abubakkar
user.bio:
I am a full stack developer focused on building AI-driven automation solutions for companies, founders, and business owners. I specialize in using tools like n8n to automate business analytics, daily reporting, alerts, and follow-ups, helping teams make faster, data-driven decisions. With strong experience across backend, frontend, databases, and AI integrations, I design end-to-end automation workflows that reduce manual work and deliver clear, actionable insights.

üìß n8n.abubakkar@gmail.com

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
